function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difference between free spread trend of COVID-19 in Wuhan and early data from other countries","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of disease spread and effectiveness of interventions","Mitigation":"Use local data for estimation and validation of models","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling tools","People":"Public health authorities, researchers","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Errors in case detection and data recording in Wuhan","Impact":"Misrepresentation of the epidemic curve and effectiveness of interventions","Mitigation":"Improve data collection and recording processes, implement quality control measures","Technologies":"Data management and quality assurance systems","People":"Healthcare workers, data analysts","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Obvious difference between population distribution and actual situation","Impact":"Inaccurate modeling of disease spread and effectiveness of interventions","Mitigation":"Use geospatial data for more accurate population distribution modeling","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis and mapping tools","People":"Urban planners, public health authorities","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, public health authorities"}]}
